original_text: “‘I will surely strike my hands together at the unjust gain you have made and at the blood you have shed in your midst.
korean_text: 네가 불의를 행하여 이익을 얻은 일과 네 가운데에 피 흘린 일로 말미암아 내가 손뼉을 쳤나니

sentences.original_text: 'I will surely strike my hands together
at the unjust gain you have made
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 불의하게 이익을 얻은 것 때문에

sentences.original_text: and at the blood you have shed
